content: When a script running in a Sandboxed instance with `AccessOutsideWrite` capability attempts to re-parent something outside the isolated container, it no longer throws an error and will instead make child Sandboxed with the same capabilities.
Improves error message around `Class.AnimationTrack` limit being reached.
Adds tooltip descriptions to new Capability groups.
Fixes issue with the Input Action System registering mouse clicks on UI buttons and in-menu.
Input Action System:  Touch keycode can now be used in InputBinding to trigger InputAction of type bool.
Opaque `*Content` in Studio is now shown as `Content` instead of blank in the **Properties** window.
In the New Luau Type Solver, using a generic type pack as an annotation for a lambda will no longer cause said annotation to leak out of the function when called.
Fixes a spurious strict mode script analysis warning that would pop up when calling `Datatype.UDim2.new()`.

Fixes an issue in script debugging so that when a debugger break is hit, all other Luau threads immediately stop executing to keep the experience's state consistent. All threads resume normal execution when the debugger continues.
Replaces the legacy implementation of `Class.Sound|Sounds` with internal audio wiring API instances when the **Sound as a Shim** beta feature is enabled.
Solid modeling now attempts to remove unnecessary geometry, reducing triangle counts in many cases.
Adds `GetMethodsOfClass` and `GetEventsOfClass` to `Class.ReflectionService`, which return reflection information about instance methods and events.
Improves the appearance of thumbnails with transparent materials (like ice) to look more accurate and less washed out.
Fixes Incorrect Occlusion Culling For SpecialMeshes with Negative Scaling.
Fixes viewport issues when the **Device Emulator** is active.
Fixes Device Emulator dropdown menu from truncating text.
Watch expressions are no longer cleared on place save.
Fixes issue with `Class.WireframeHandleAdornment` text not being relative to the adornee.
Adds mouse support to iPadOS.
Fixes a bug where disabling and re-enabling `Class.IKControl` with `Class.IKControl.Type|Type` of `Enum.IKControlType.LookAt` led to initial jitter on the part.
Fixes potential false culling of parts and characters that are far from the origin.
Updates several error messages incorrectly referring to "Game Settings" to "Experience Settings".
